phenocam_EN

Source: R/data.r
phenocam_EN.Rd

Data structure containing budburst dates for all evergreen needleleaf (EN) sites included in the first PhenoCam data release. These data are described in detail in Richardson et al. (2017)

phenocam_EN

Format

A structured list with 6 variables:

site

PhenoCam site name

location

geographic location

doy

DOY (1 - 365 as a vector)

transition_dates

budburst dates, as per 25 percent of the Gcc amplitude

Ti

mean daily temperature, matrix 365 rows x # site years columns

Li

daylength, matrix 365 rows x # site years columns
